sentences.en: a bird’s nest
sentences.cn: 鸟窝

sentences.en: a bird's nest with two eggs in it
sentences.cn: 内有两只鸟蛋的鸟窝

sentences.en: a field mouse’s nest
sentences.cn: 田鼠穴

sentences.en: a nest of thieves
sentences.cn: 贼窝

sentences.en: As soon as the two chicks hatch, they leave the nest burrow.
sentences.cn: 两只小鸟一出壳就离开了巢穴。

sentences.en: His criticisms of the president stirred up a hornet's nest.
sentences.cn: 他对董事长的批评造成众愤难平.

sentences.en: In May the females build a nest and lay their eggs.
sentences.cn: 雌鸟在5月份筑巢产蛋。

sentences.en: It is an ill bird that fouls its own nest.
sentences.cn: [谚]家丑不可外扬.

sentences.en: Most birds nest in a tree.
sentences.cn: 多数鸟在树上筑巢.

sentences.en: The actual nest is a work of art.
sentences.cn: 真实的鸟巢十分精致。

sentences.en: The blackbird's nest contained four eggs.
sentences.cn: 黑鹂巢里有四个蛋.

sentences.en: The bottom of the nest is laid with feathers and hair.
sentences.cn: 巢的底部是用羽毛和头发铺成的.

sentences.en: The nest contained eight little mice that were naked and blind.
sentences.cn: 窝里有8只还没长毛、眼睛尚未睁开的小老鼠。

sentences.en: The palace was a nest of intrigue.
sentences.cn: 这座宫殿曾是阴谋诡计的策源地.

sentences.en: The robins occupied their former nest.
sentences.cn: 那些知更鸟占了它们的老窝.

sentences.en: The swallows are building a nest under the roof of our house.
sentences.cn: 燕子正在我们的屋檐下筑巢.

sentences.en: They bottled up the submarines in their nest.
sentences.cn: 他们把潜艇困在巢穴里,使其无法出击.

sentences.en: They say eagles used to nest in those rocks.
sentences.cn: 他们说以前常有老鹰在那些岩石中筑巢。

sentences.en: When a bird's nest is overturned, no egg can remain intact.
sentences.cn: 覆巢之下无完卵.

sentences.en: Young eagles leave the nest after only two months.
sentences.cn: 雏鹰仅仅两个月以后就会飞离鸟巢。

words.tran_cn: 穴居的兽；筑巢的鸟；放牧地自耕农；试验筛组的单位筛
安顿下来；筑巢；把…安置于巢中（nestle的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 空巢；空巢期；儿女长大离家
储蓄金，储备金（为养老或应变等用）

trans.tran_cn: 巢，安乐窝，窝点，一套物件
trans.tran_en: a place made or chosen by a bird to lay its eggs in and to live in
to build or use a nest
to build or use a nest
